thread.title: Man Dances in Excitement as DNA Test Confirms He's Not the Father of 3-Month-Old Baby, Video Trends
thread.title_full: Man Dances in Excitement as DNA Test Confirms He's Not the Father of 3-Month-Old Baby, Video Trends - Tuko.co.ke

author: Muyela Roberto
title: Man Dances in Excitement as DNA Test Confirms He's Not the Father of 3-Month-Old Baby, Video Trends
text: Man Dances in Excitement as DNA Test Confirms He's Not the Father of 3-Month-Old Baby, Video Trends - A black man was filled with joy after a DNA test confirmed that he was not the father of a three-month-old baby - The mother of the child, who was already in a relationship with another man, claimed that the baby was his - The woman felt ashamed and ran out when the results were revealed, while the man screamed in excitement A woman's attempt to prove that her ex-lover was the father of her three-month-old baby has left her in total shame. In a video shared on [TikTok](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/tiktok/) by @officialmauryshow, the lady first claimed that her man had lied about the length of their relationship. Man rejoices as DNA results exonerate Despite the man insisting that he was infertile, the lady chose to bring him for the DNA test to prove that he was lying and to make him take responsibility. Just 3 Days after Breaking Up, Lady Finds Out Her Ex Was Getting Married to Another Girl, Chats Leak However, the lady's hopes were dashed when DNA proved that the man was not the father of the baby. The man jumped up excitedly, stating that the woman could leave him alone since the baby wasn't his. The lady who came to the show with the current man in her life ran out in shame and tears. The show's host sympathised with her, reminding her of the man in her life who was ready to take responsibility. Her man also reassured her by giving her a warm hug. Reactions as man rejoices over DNA test result The video sparked lots of reactions from netizens in the [comments](https://www.tuko.co.ke/361693-150-comments-boys-pic-instagram.html) section. Six Baby reacted: “I really don't get the running away part.” Tiffany Gonsalves said: “The guy mouthed the words "You are not". He knew what Maury was going to say.” Jill Gil|198 said: “Why run like there somewhere to hide.” @gdubulous said: “The poor baby crying in the background.” @lenee said: I'm crying it was the "I milly rock on any block." @k lew said: “The way she already knew.” Bossdaddydre_ said: “The run backstage was so delayed.” Watch the video below: Man embarrassed after child's DNA test Elsewhere, a Zimbabwean man who vehemently doubted the paternity of his child was left in disbelief as a DNA test [revealed that he was indeed the biological father](https://www.tuko.co.ke/people/538306-man-claimed-s-impotent-embarrassed-dna-proves-fathered-child-wife/) of the child he had questioned. The man had accused his wife of infidelity, insisting that he could not be the father due to his perceived impotence. The dramatic revelation unfolded on the Zimbabwean Closure DNA Show, a platform known for resolving paternity disputes through DNA testing. Source: [Legit.ng](https://www.legit.ng/people/1581333-man-screams-excitement-court-declares-s-father-3-month-baby-video-trends/)
